snippet: The release of the patient, a baby, meant that Guinea could begin a 42-day countdown to formally end the outbreak.
abstract: Nineteen-day-old boy, Guinea's last known Ebola patient, is released from medical center, beginning 42-day period after which outbreak is technically over in last country fighting epidemic.
lead_paragraph: The release of the patient, a baby, meant that Guinea could begin a 42-day countdown to formally end the outbreak.

headline.main: Guinea: Last Known Ebola Patient Has Recovered and Is Released
headline.print_headline: Africa; Guinea: Last Known Ebola Patient Has Recovered and Is Released
